snippet: The president’s main source of income continues to be his publishing career. But Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. earned less than $201 in royalties from his book in 2013.
abstract: White House financial disclosure form indicates that assets of Pres Obama and his wife Michelle were valued as high as $7 million in 2013; most of his income came from royalties on his three books and investments made possible by proceeds.
lead_paragraph: The president’s main source of income continues to be his publishing career. But Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. earned less than $201 in royalties from his book in 2013.

headline.main: Obamas Had Up to $7 Million in Assets in ’13, Records Show
headline.print_headline: Obamas Had Up to $7 Million in Assets in ’13, Records Show
